name: Learning Approach
description: A template focused on structured learning, breaking down topics into key concepts, examples, and further reading.

sections.title: Introduction to [Topic]
sections.prompt: Provide an introductory overview of the topic '[Topic]', explaining its relevance and basic principles.

sections.title: Key Concepts and Definitions
sections.prompt: Detail the core concepts and definitions related to '[Topic]'. Explain each concept clearly and concisely.

sections.title: Examples and Case Studies
sections.prompt: Illustrate the application of '[Topic]' with practical examples or relevant case studies. Explain how these concepts are used in real-world scenarios.

sections.title: Summary and Key Takeaways
sections.prompt: Summarize the main points of '[Topic]' and highlight the key takeaways for effective learning.

sections.title: Further Reading and Resources
sections.prompt: Suggest additional resources, books, articles, or websites for deeper understanding and continued learning on '[Topic]'.
